answers.answer: I had 154 on my 1hr will be taking the 3hr in a few hrs...will keep ya updated should have my results today.
I just got my results of 150 today also :( very bummed and don't understand why. I am taking 3 hour on Saturday, sending you positive thoughts!
What will happen if you fail the 3 hr test?
After my 1hr screening my level was 179. I did the 3hr and failed it as well
My 1-hour test was 166, but I just got my results from my 3-hour and I passed!!

Let's all keep each other updated and send positive  thoughts and prayers. Im bummed too.@mogpog that's wonderful news congrats! @deja_summers if u fail the 3hr test u are diagnosed with gestational diabetes.@jcemily good luck with your 3 hr test.@Mak2015 keep us posted good luck! !!
That happened with my oldest son but my second test case back great.
I got 146 last week on my 1 hour.  Taking the 3 hour friday, fingers crossed!
Me too! My one hour was 146...currently sitting here taking my three hour now. 2 blood draws down, 2 to go!
Dreading the 3 hour, is it as bad as I hear?

It's long! The first time I was told I could eat protein...this time I was told I could not eat anything 100% fast...I'm starving! Also there are a total of four blood draws...one baseline, then one every hour. Hope you don't mind needle sticks.
I did
I don't mind blood draws, but I think with the fasting and sugar drink, we won't be feeling the best, so I can imagine it can get to you!

What period of time did they make you fast? They only told me nothing after midnight. I had dinner and ice cream just now. Only drinking water for the rest of night. Planning to go to bed soon as well.

Hi ladies...update is I failed the 3hr test:-(. I feel so bad and not excited about the next few mths to come. I have a nutritional class i have to go to on Friday where they will put me on a strict diet and show me how to prick my finger and test thru out the day. I am going to work hard at it tho because I would hate to keep the diabetes after the pregnancy is over.
mine was 156 at my 1 hr and I passed my 3 hour!
My 1 hrs was 150 and I passed the 3hr one

Soooo sorry to hear this.  I hope the next month's go well for u. Be doing! !! Im currently  at my 3hr test. Ive peed got the initial prick and drank the 100gram solution. Now im waiting for the 1 hr prick,2 hr prick and 3 hr prick. I PRAY ALL GOES WELL, I DON'T THINK I CAN MENTALLY HANDLE GESTATIONAL  DIABETES
Greatluck @irishjam! Yea i am drained already and haven't even begun the process. As long as baby is doing okay I am fine with doing whatever it takes!

If yall fail your 3 hour you can ask your doc to see if they will do a 7 day glucose montor which yes it ***** you poke your finger 4x a day and record what it says I am finding this to be a lot more accurate then all the sugary drinks that I failed and crashed so hard with. I am looking at my numbers and they are really not that bad.. I will know more monday if I pass this one or not. Just an idea for those of you who failed your 3 hour you can ask your ob :) good luck lady's

question: I did mine yesterday afternoon, they didn't make me fast.now i failed at 150.the normal range is 65-139 smh.i have to do the 3hr test on Thursday.  Did anyone fail as badly as i did at 150 and still end up passing the 3 hr test?
title: failed glucose test :( did anyone pass after a score of 150?
